output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require("knitr")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggrepel)
opts_knit$set(root.dir = "../work-codes")
```

```{r}
dat <- read.csv("../../work-codes/Data/PECA_SLCTvSLCT.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
dat <- dat[which(dat$pepNum>2),]
```

filter to keep FDR<0.01, slr>2
```{r}
dat$slr_abs <- abs(dat$slr)
dat$log_fdr <- -log10(dat$p.fdr)
dat$DE <- dat$slr_abs>1.5 & dat$log_fdr>2

volcanol_plot <- ggplot(dat, aes(x=slr, y = log_fdr, colour = DE))+
  geom_point() + geom_hline(aes(yintercept= 2) , linetype = 3)+
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = 1.5), linetype = 3)+
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = -1.5), linetype = 3) 

plot <- volcanol_plot+theme_light() + 
  scale_color_manual(values=c('#808080', '#A53205')) +
  ggtitle("Differentially expressed protines in SCCOHT compared to HGSC") +
  xlab("Fold change")+
  ylab("-log10(p.adj)")+
  geom_label_repel(data=subset(dat, dat$log_fdr>15 & dat$slr_abs>3), aes(label=Gene), frontface = "bold", box.padding = 0.25, point.padding = 0.3, nudge_y = 0.25 ,colour = "black")+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 13))

plot
```
```{r}
plot_ass <- volcanol_plot+theme_light() + 
  scale_color_manual(values=c('#808080', '#A53205')) +
  ggtitle("Differentially expressed proteins in SLCT compared to HGSC") +
  xlab("Fold change")+
  ylab("-log10(p.adj)")+
  geom_label_repel(data=dat[dat$Gene=="ASS1",], aes(label=Gene), frontface = "bold", box.padding = 1, point.padding = 1, nudge_y = 1 , nudge_x = 1, colour = "black")+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 13))

plot_ass
```

Print PDF
```{r}
pdf("volcano.pdf", width = 8, height= 6)
plot
dev.off()
```
